dmca.title: DMCA Complaint- Marilyn Moody
dmca.body:
October 23, 2006 

Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
 
I am writing to inform you of the infringement of copyrighted work owned by Marilyn K. Moody.

1. The work is the "Patent Search Information Site" located at www.patent-search-information.com. I registered this domain in July 2004 and began adding content to the site in October of 2004.

2. This work has been copied by the "Patent Ideas" site at http://www.patentideas.cn/. The copied content is of my site content as of the August/September 2006 time period. I am able to identify the timeframe because it has copied a left-hand border design that I only used for a short amount of time. 

You can find this content by doing the following: 
Search Query: "How to find a patent attorney" 
Infringing Web Page: www.patentideas.cn/

3. My contact information is: 
Marilyn K- Moody 
E-Mail: business@patent-search-information.com OR marilynmoody@gmail.com
 
4. The infringing site lists its e-mail address as: search@patentideas.cn 
WhoIs data provides the following: 
[whois.cnnic.net.cn]
Domain Name: patentideas.cn 
ROID: 20060928s10001s83730809-cn 
Domain Status: ok
Registrant Organization: 
Registrant Name: 
Administrative Email: info@PATENTIDEAs.cn 
Sponsoring Registrar:
Name Server:nsl.dns.com.cn 
Name Server:ns2.dns.com.cn 
Registration Date: 2006-09-28 00:36 
Expiration Date: 2007-09-28 00:36 
5. "I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law." 
6. Marilyn K. Moody
